meanings.definition: A portion of a film or recording that is not included in the final version.
meanings.sent1: The director decided to include some funny outtakes at the end of the movie.
meanings.sent2: The DVD bonus features included a reel of hilarious outtakes from the filming.
meanings.sent3: Watching the outtakes made everyone on set burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The outtakes were like hidden gems, revealing the lighter side of the actors.
meanings.sent5: The outtakes were so entertaining that they became the highlight of the film production.

meanings.definition: A mistake or error made during the filming or recording process.
meanings.sent1: The outtakes in the blooper reel had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent2: The editor had to carefully review the outtakes to fix any errors.
meanings.sent3: Despite the outtakes, the final cut of the movie was a success.
meanings.sent4: The outtakes served as a reminder of the fun moments during filming.
meanings.sent5: The outtakes added a touch of authenticity to the final recording.
